thread.title: UT responds to rumors of Coach Butch Jones punching a player
thread.title_full: UT responds to rumors of Coach Butch Jones punching a player

title: UT responds to rumors of Coach Butch Jones punching a player
text:
UT responds to rumors of Coach Butch Jones punching a player By: WVLT Staff Email Updated: Thu 1:40 PM, Oct 08, 2015 By: WVLT Staff Email / Headlines List / Article 
KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (WVLT) -- UT Chancellor Jimmy Cheek responded to rumors of UT Football Coach Butch Jones punching a player. The full statement is below: 
"There's been a lot of rumor and misinformation on social media and message boards about an alleged incident during football practice. It's not our practice to respond to rumors, but I thought it was important to let you know that we've done our due diligence and Dave Hart and I are very confident there was no inappropriate conduct with any players or coaches." 
The rumors came out this week after Tennessee's loss to Arkansas. The allegations popped up in online forums that Coach Jones punched a player during practice. 
Jones called the rumors "absolutely ridiculous" at a press conference Monday.
